title: evangelion retake doujin.pdf
description: Evangelion Retake is a hentai doujin set in the Neon Genesis Evangelion anime. It depicts a pairing of Shinji Ikari and Asuke Langley Soryu, with one sided feelings for Rei Ayanami for Shinji. In my opinion it is the finest piece of amateur comic writing ever written (it is obviously not an official work by GAINAX). There are links on piratebay for a 100MB download (that&#039;s how I got it originally) but I converted the seperate JPGs into one PDF using Adobe Acrobat 8 Professional for easier viewing (in my experience, its easier reading comics as PDF instead of each page as a seperate JPG file). You will need Adobe Reader to view this (its a free download from www.adobe.com), preferably Reader 8 or higher.
